## RpcClient class

Remote procedure client for use over postMessage. Instantiates a message listener by default i.e. it \*will\* listen for incoming messages once initialized. Any event listeners are automatically finalized

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class RpcClient extends EphemeralListener 
```
<b>Extends:</b> EphemeralListener

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(parentOrigin, serialize, deserialize, logger, loggerLocale, shouldDisableLogger)](./paper-cups.rpcclient._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>RpcClient</code> class |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [listenAndWait(opcode, timeout)](./paper-cups.rpcclient.listenandwait.md) |  | Wait for the next message of a given <code>opcode</code>. \*\*\*This will block the main thread\*\*\*. |
|  [once(opcode, handler)](./paper-cups.rpcclient.once.md) |  | Execute a subscription once. Non-blocking. |
|  [onMessage(event)](./paper-cups.rpcclient.onmessage.md) |  | Message receiver. |
|  [sendAndWait(opcode, payload, timeout)](./paper-cups.rpcclient.sendandwait.md) |  | Execute a message exchange and \*wait\* for the response. \*\*\*This will block the main thread\*\*\*. |
|  [sendMessage({ opcode, txId, payload, delay })](./paper-cups.rpcclient.sendmessage.md) |  |  |
|  [subscribe(opcode, handler)](./paper-cups.rpcclient.subscribe.md) |  | Subscribe to messages of type opcode. |
